summary: The National Rugby League (NRL) is a big rugby competition in Australia and New Zealand. It started in 1998, after two big rugby groups joined together. The league has teams from different parts of Australia and New Zealand. Each team plays 24 games, and the best team wins the minor premiership. Then, the top eight teams compete in the finals to win the big NRL Grand Final. The Penrith Panthers are the current champions, winning their fourth title in a row in 2024. The NRL season usually happens from March to October.
title: National Rugby League
